data.title: Ridgewood School
data.text:
Ridgewood School is an Academy within Leger Education Trust. We are committed to providing a curriculum which is challenging yet accessible, and which fosters a love of learning, as well as enabling students to achieve success in exams and assessments. We want every student who leaves Ridgewood School to aspire to achieve beyond what they thought they could do when they first started with us. Our school motto, ‘Prepare for the road ahead’, represents our belief in preparing our students for their future. We exemplify our motto not only in terms of academ...

Ridgewood Summer Showcase

We are excited to announce that the Ridgewood Summer Showcase will be held on Thursday 18 July at 6.00pm. The evening will include an abridged version of Shrek the musical and music, dance and cheerleading performances from Ridgewood students. To reserve tickets please use the 'Cont...

School Governor Vacancies

The school is seeking to recruit new Governors who can provide strategic support and guidance ensuring high standards of achievement for the school. We would be delighted to hear from anyone who has: An interest in the performance of the school An open, enquiring mind and the ab...
